long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Notersy allows you to capture notes from your favorite websites or create custom notes and reminders. Select the text and add it through the context menu. Create a custom note and format it, using the in-built rich text editor. The notes will be saved even if you close your browser so that you can always access them at a later time. Started typing and closed the extension by mistake? No worries as your progress will be saved and you can always continue where you left off!

üìù You can: 

‚≠ê Add notes through the context menu

‚≠ê Create categories and collections and organize your notes however you wish

‚≠ê Delete notes and/or categories when you no longer need them

‚≠ê Create custom notes and format them using the in-built rich text editor

‚≠ê Edit notes or change their content 

‚≠ê Notes are saved automatically as you type

‚≠ê Your data will persist even if your browser is closed
